div.p: Dear BHRSD Community, Good morning. I hope you’re doing well during these challenging times. I hope the remote learning options are engaging and supportive. I’m reaching out with four updates. 1) With guidance from the Commissioner’s Office, we are updating our last day of school. Our last day of school is now Friday June 12th. 2) We continue to work to meet the needs of families facing food insecurity.
